name: Erai-Raws but not terribly designed
description:
Title. 
Erai-Raws looks pree bad by today's standards
This... lessens that somewhat.
additional_info:
Release!
- Cleaned up that annoying background
- Changed the header to a full-width one, looks a little sleeker
- Made colours more consistent (I mean, I only use 3 main element colours, and another one that mimics a forth)

Update 1
- So... I dunno why exactly, but things were changed a little on their end. This is a minor update to address that
